title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site: Anniversary of TR's 1901 Inauguration
body: September 14:  The Anniversary of TR's 1901 Inauguration          Theodore Roosevelt was inaugurated as the 26th President of the United States in Buffalo, NY on September 14, 1901. The TR Inaugural Site begins its annual commemoration with an inaugural reenactment at the Site. The Site is also proud to host a U.S. Naturalization Ceremony with the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services. For details, see trsite.org
